what.title: What Is AI Video Generator?
what.description: An AI-powered platform that transforms still images or text prompts into animated, emotionally rich videos.
what.itemDescription1: Infuse life into your favorite photos with authentic, expressive animations.
what.itemDescription2: Upload an image, describe your idea—our AI handles the rest in minutes.
what.itemDescription3: Export high-resolution videos that are social-media ready.
what.itemDescription4: Designed for anyone—no tech or creative background required.

how.title: How to Create Your First AI Video Generator Video
how.description: Make stunning AI videos in three simple steps:
how.item1: Choose a clear, well-lit photo or enter a text prompt.
how.item2: Describe the mood or style you want—romantic, cinematic, surreal, etc.
how.item3: Let the AI animate your story into a video.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.description: See how AI Video Generator has helped people turn their imagination into moving stories.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.Q1: How do I begin making my first video with AI Video Generator?
FAQ.A1: Simply click 'Upload', choose a photo or enter a prompt, and let our AI generate your video. The clearer your input, the better your result.
FAQ.Q2: Can I control the animation style?
FAQ.A2: Yes! Just describe the mood or theme you want—our AI adapts accordingly to match your vision.
FAQ.Q3: What's included in the free trial?
FAQ.A3: You'll receive 5 free credits to explore different animation styles and generate multiple videos. Each creation uses one credit.
FAQ.Q4: How do I cancel my subscription?
FAQ.A4: Email our support team at support@ai-videogenerator.app. Your plan will remain active until the end of your billing period—no additional charges or hidden fees.
FAQ.A5: We offer flexible monthly and discounted annual subscriptions. You can also buy additional credits as needed.
FAQ.Q6: Which plan offers the best value?
FAQ.A6: Our annual plan offers the best price per credit. Perfect for regular creators looking to maximize output at a lower cost.

seo.title: AI Video Generator Pricing – Flexible Plans for Every Creator
seo.description: Discover AI Video Generator's flexible pricing options designed for creators, marketers, and storytellers to generate cinematic videos with ease.

FAQ.title: Subscription & Billing Questions
FAQ.A1: Yes. Just send us an email at support@ai-videogenerator.com. Your subscription will stay active until your billing cycle ends.
FAQ.Q2: Do you offer monthly and annual plans?
FAQ.A2: Absolutely. Monthly for flexibility, annual for the best savings.
FAQ.Q3: Which plan is the most cost-effective?
FAQ.A3: The annual plan gives you the lowest price per credit. It's ideal if you plan to create videos regularly.
FAQ.A4: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your subscription at any time.
FAQ.Q5: How do you ensure video quality?
FAQ.A5: Our AI uses advanced motion synthesis and enhancement tools. We also offer preview videos so you know what to expect.
FAQ.Q6: Is there a cap on how many videos I can create?
FAQ.A6: Each plan has a credit limit, which determines how many creations you can generate. You can always purchase more if needed.
FAQ.Q7: What if I run out of credits?
FAQ.A7: You can purchase one-time credit packs anytime. No subscription changes needed.
FAQ.A8: Reach out to our support team through live chat or email—we're here to help.
FAQ.Q9: Do I need to install anything?
FAQ.A9: Nope! AI Video Generator is completely web-based. All you need is a browser and an internet connection.
FAQ.A10: Yes—we use Stripe to handle all transactions with the highest standards in security and encryption.
